title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
about Halsin. Pick up the key and use it on the locked door in the Chapel. This will complete Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help.

How to unlock Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help

Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help is a subquest of Find a Cure.
